Summary: A pinkish hue light hovering and then moving in a North West direction
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were no other sightings in Houston on or around February 2nd 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking home from lunch, and I happened to look up and see the light (pinkish) hovering in the clouds in the North West sky. Initially, I thought it might be a balloon. However, it just was hanging there. I ran in my apartment and got my video camera and filmed it. I had a hard time focusing on it or finding it with my camera due to it being so bright -- very hard to see the LCD screen in the day light. Finally I lost track of the craft as it moved through the clouds.
